alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 03 at 1:29PM MST until January 04 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 2 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Highlands and Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 2 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass
